events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their vehicle and filed the initial auto accident claim with all relevant details.
The claim was reviewed and categorised specifically under Auto Accident based on the submitted report and keywords found.
An insurance agent specializing in auto claims was assigned to the case to guide the customer through the process.
Official acknowledgment sent to the claimant confirming receipt of the auto accident claim and next steps.
Request sent to customer for photos of vehicle damage, police report, and repair estimates to support investigation.
The customer submitted all requested documents including accident photos and official police report promptly.
Investigation team began reviewing submitted evidence and checking vehicle history to assess claim validity.
Investigation concluded confirming the collision circumstances and validating the claim as eligible for settlement.
A settlement offer was presented to the claimant covering all repair costs and damages under their auto policy.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement amount and the support provided by the claims agent.
The claim was officially approved after acceptance of the settlement offer by the customer without objections.
Payment for the approved claim amount was promptly issued to the customer via direct deposit.
Claim was formally closed following the successful issuance of payment and completion of all necessary procedures.
All claim documents and communication records archived in the system for future reference and auditing purposes.
